snippet: Mr. le Sourd was syndicated nationally in Gannett Company newspapers for three decades.
abstract: Jacques le Sourd, a theater critic whose Broadway and Off Broadway reviews for The Journal News of Westchester were syndicated nationally in the Gannett Company’s newspaper chain for three decades, dies at age 64.
lead_paragraph: Mr. le Sourd was syndicated nationally in Gannett Company newspapers for three decades.

headline.main: Jacques le Sourd, Theater Critic, Dies at 64
